page.title: 16The Sawmill-3
page.content:
There is another group connected with the sawmill, these are the{fencers}who use the fenceposts made by the mill, they also store their equipment there. They work on the estate for farmers on the estate and other customers who benefit from their experience and equipment.
The foresters are kept busy all year planting, brashing, weeding, felling, extracting timber and draining new areas.
Although there is a lot of land involved only a few men work at the sawmill and in the forests. Because of new management many changes have been made on the estate, but the forestry side has been relatively unaffected.
